g.title: leaf_9
g.text: Our weaver is currently somewhat narrowly focused on markdown.

g.title: leaf_24
g.text: The sh-lib monkeypatches the global metatable, and all we want is one
command, so we do something odd here:

g.title: leaf_29
g.text: for dir in pl_dir.walk(pwd, false, false) do
if not strHas(".git", dir) and isdir(dir)
-- Compare, report, and write out if necessary
for dir in pl_dir.walk(pwd, false, false) do
if not strHas(".git", dir) and isdir(dir)
